contents.text: Welcome to Oracle in Peninsula, where we deliver a comprehensive and fully integrated stack of cloud applications and platform services.
For sales and product information, press 1.
To speak with a cloud applications specialist, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a cloud applications specialist.

navigationGoals: Could you give me pricing and feature details for Oracle’s cloud applications?
Ask about cloud applications pricing and veteran discount eligibility.
I want to discuss enterprise SaaS licensing options and integration APIs for your cloud application suite.
I’d like to speak with someone about purchasing cloud applications.
I need pricing details and academic plans for Oracle’s cloud applications to manage my lab data.

contents.text: To connect with a platform services advisor, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a platform services advisor.

navigationGoals: I’d like to discuss Oracle’s platform services options and costs.
Find out how to configure platform services to host my veteran support portal.
I need details on your PaaS container orchestration service, including Kubernetes cluster autoscaling and uptime SLA.
I need to talk to a platform services advisor about subscription options.
I want information on Oracle’s platform compute and storage options for running physics simulations.

contents.text: For technical support and service assistance, press 2.
One moment please while we transfer you to our cloud applications support team.

navigationGoals: I’m experiencing an error in my Oracle cloud applications and need support.
Troubleshoot an access error in the cloud applications portal I’m using.
I’m having API authentication failures in your cloud ERP application; I need help troubleshooting OAuth token errors.
I’m having trouble accessing my cloud applications and need technical support.
I’m unable to access my Oracle cloud applications to upload my experiment results and need help.

contents.text: One moment please while we transfer you to our platform services support team.

navigationGoals: My Oracle platform services deployment isn’t functioning correctly—please help.
Resolve high latency issues on my platform services deployment.
I’m experiencing high latency in my virtual network on your platform service; I need assistance optimizing VPC configuration.
My platform services aren’t working properly and I need help troubleshooting.
My Oracle cloud virtual machine won’t start and I need assistance troubleshooting the platform service.
